plot: Hannah's marriage is a prison. After years of suffering at the hands of her abusive husband Matt, she devises a plan to escape. But when she shares her plan with her best friend, Elle, complications ensue.
title: Exit Plan
plot_es: Hannah's marriage is a prison. After years of suffering at the hands of her abusive husband Matt, she devises a plan to escape. But when she shares her plan with her best friend, Elle, complications ensue.
plot_en: Hannah's marriage is a prison. After years of suffering at the hands of her abusive husband Matt, she devises a plan to escape. But when she shares her plan with her best friend, Elle, complications ensue.
